# **📋 San Jose Utility Provider Run Book**

## **⚡ Electricity – Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E)**
### **Power Outage Response Guide**
#### **Company Description**
- **PG&E** is one of the largest combined natural gas and electric utilities in the U.S., serving millions of customers in Northern and Central California.

#### **Contact Info**
- **Customer Service:** 1-800-743-5000
- **Outage Reporting:** 1-800-743-5002
- **Website:** [www.pge.com](https://www.pge.com)
- **Emergency (Gas & Electric):** 1-800-743-5000

#### **Emergency Steps**
- **If power goes out:**
  - Check PG&E’s [Outage Map](https://www.pge.com/outages) for updates.
  - Report an outage via phone or online.
  - Unplug sensitive electronics to avoid damage from surges.
- **If you see downed power lines:**
  - Stay at least **30 feet away** and call **911** immediately.
  - Do **not** touch anything in contact with the line.

## **🔥 Natural Gas – Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E)**
### **Gas Leak Response Guide**
#### **Company Description**
- PG&E provides natural gas service to residential and commercial customers, ensuring safe and reliable energy delivery.

#### **Contact Info**
- **Gas Emergency (24/7):** 1-800-743-5000
- **Customer Service:** 1-800-743-5000
- **Website:** [www.pge.com](https://www.pge.com)

#### **Emergency Steps**
- **If you smell gas (rotten egg odor):**
  - **Do not** turn on/off lights or electrical devices.
  - **Evacuate** the area immediately.
  - Call **911** and **PG&E’s emergency line** from a safe location.
- **If you hear a hissing sound near a gas line:**
  - Leave the area and call PG&E.

### **Water Outage or Leak Guide**
#### **Company Description**
- **San Jose Water Company** is a privately owned utility providing water service to San Jose and surrounding areas.

- **Emergency (24/7):** 1-408-279-7900

### **Internet Outage Response Guide**
#### **Company Description**
- **Comcast Xfinity** is a major U.S. telecommunications provider offering internet, TV, and phone services.

#### **Contact Info**
